card.name: Khinia, Shepherd of Sands
card.text: When Khinia, Shepherd of Sands enters or leaves the battlefield, put a 3/5 white Sand Golem creature token with vigilance named Sand Sentinel onto the battlefield. Evanesce {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Hezzan, Accursed Djinni
card.text: Scry 3. Name a card, then reveal the top card of your library. If you revealed the named card, you may play it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, draw a card. You gain an emblem with "Play with the top card of your library revealed" and "You may play the top card of your library."

card.name: Xal'il, Suitor of Death
card.text: Discard a card, then sacrifice a creature. If you don't, remove two loyalty counters from Xal'il, Suitor of Death. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Each opponent sacrifices each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Honor the Lost
card.text: Each instant and sorcery card not named Honor the Lost in your graveyard gains memorial until end of turn. The memorial cost is equal to its mana cost. If Honor the Lost was cast for its memorial cost, the memorial cost is {0} instead. Memorial {5}{R} (Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)

card.name: Ilin, Wayward Spirit
card.text: Flash Ilin, Wayward Spirit can't be countered. When Ilin, Wayward Spirit enters the battlefield, you may have any number of target lands you control become 3/3 Elemental creatures with haste until end of turn. They're still lands.

card.name: Breath of the Bewitched
card.text: When Breath of the Bewitched enters or leaves the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Evanesce {8} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Urza, God of Eternities
card.text: Cast Urza, God of Eternities only if your ancestry in white or your ancestry in blue is five or greater. When you cast Urza, God of Eternities, take an extra turn after this one. {4}{W}{U}: Draw two cards, then you gain 4 life.

card.name: Karn, God of Impurity
card.text: Cast Karn, God of Impurity only if your ancestry in black or your ancestry in colorless is five or greater. When you cast Karn, God of Impurity, destroy all other creatures. {6}{C}{B}: Return up to two target creature cards in graveyards to the battlefield tapped and under your control.

card.name: Sarkhan, God of Cataclysm
card.text: Cast Sarkhan, God of Cataclysm only if your ancestry in red or your ancestry in green is five or greater. When you cast Sarkhan, God of Cataclysm, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. {2}{R}{G}: Each other creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Temple of Wavering Faith
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If this mana is spent to cast a God spell, that spell can't be countered. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a God: Search your library for a God creature card with a different name, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Glasswing Nurturer
card.text: Flying When Glasswing Nurturer enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls. Return it to its owner's hand when Glasswing Nurturer leaves the battlefield. Evanesce {1}{W}{U} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Huitzil Flagbearer
card.text: Flying Whenever Huitzil Flagbearer attacks, you may put a creature card with flying and converted mana cost X or less from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking, where X is your ancestry in white. (Each white card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in white.)

card.name: Quetzal of Divinity
card.text: Flying When Quetzal of Divinity enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with power 6 or greater an opponent controls. Evanesce {2}{W} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Yan'et, Temple Guardian
card.text: {3}{W}{W}: Put a legendary 4/4 white Spirit creature token named Ayana, the Guardian Soul onto the battlefield with your choice of first strike, lifelink, or vigilance. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Coyopa's Retribution
card.text: Coyopa's Retribution deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature is a God, exile it instead.

card.name: One
card.text: Each player chooses a creature he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Hooded Robin
card.text: Flying Whenever Hooded Robin deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card and that player discards a card.

card.name: Ay'I, the Templesworn
card.text: Flying Penance — {X}{U}{U}, Sacrifice Ay'I, the Templesworn: Reveal the top X cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Delver of the Beyond
card.text: {X}{U}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard with converted mana cost X: Put an X/X blue Illusion creature token onto the battlefield. When that creature token leaves the battlefield, you may cast the exiled instant or sorcery card without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.

card.name: Rattle the Bones
card.text: Counter target spell. Memorial {U} (Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)

card.name: Cuetzal's Retaliation
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If that creature is a God, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

card.name: Up // At 'em
card.text:
Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a Dragon Illusion with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.
---
Each creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Etzpali Graveleader
card.text: Whenever another Lizard creature enters the battlefield under your control, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Whenever another nontoken Lizard creature you control dies, you may pay {B}{R}. If you do, put a 2/2 black and red Zombie Lizard creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Phyrexian Parasite
card.text: Phyrexian Parasite enters the battlefield with three -1/-1 counters on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may pay {B} and remove a -1/-1 counter from Phyrexian Parasite. If you do, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Etzpali Tombspeaker
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) When Etzpali Tombspeaker enters the battlefield, another target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is your ancestry in black. (Each black card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in black.)

card.name: Fear of the Dark
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Memorial {B} (Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)

card.name: Ix's Revenge
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. if that creature is a God, it gets -12/-12 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Crave // Save
card.text:
As an additional cost to cast Crave, discard your hand. Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. Exile Crave.
---
Return three target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Save.

card.text: When Cuitla Chieftain enters the battlefield, add {R}{R}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Evanesce {1}{R}{G} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Ehnit, Driven by Piety
card.text: Flying Penance — {X}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Ehnit, Driven by Piety: Exile the top X cards of target opponent's library. You may play cards exiled in this way for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as if it were mana of any color to cast spells exiled in this way.

card.name: Sky Shredder
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Sky Shredder deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal that much damage to target planeswalker that player controls.

card.name: Fear the Fire
card.text: Fear the Fire deals X damage to target creature or player. Memorial {X}{R} (Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)

card.name: Cabracan's Wrath
card.text: Cabracan's Wrath deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature is a God, Cabracan's Wrath deals 12 damage to it instead.

card.name: The Sacred Trio
card.text: Trample Whenever an opponent casts a spell that targets The Sacred Trio, counter it unless that player pays {3}. Whenever The Sacred Trio deals combat damage to an opponent, that player can't cast spells or activate abilities until the end of their next main phase.

card.name: Swarm of Hornets
card.text: Flying Penance — {G}, Sacrifice Swarm of Hornets: Your opponents can't cast spells until end of turn. Activate this ability only at any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Oracle of the Ancestors

card.name: Icoatl Strategist
card.text: Hexproof Snake creatures you control get +1/+1 and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Akna's Vengence
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. If the creature you don't control is a God, the creature you control gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

card.text: Deathtouch Penance — {1}{G}, Sacrifice Icoatl Bushwhacker: Icoatl Bushwhacker deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Grafted Beetle
card.text: When Grafted Beetle dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Synagogue Sentinel
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Orchard Cultivator
card.text: Penance — {2}{G}, Sacrifice Orchard Cultivator: Search your library for two basic land cards, reveal them, and put one into your hand and the other onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Chihacuan Grovetender
card.text: When Chihacuan Grovetender enters the battlefield, put two 0/1 green Plant creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Corridor Recluse
card.text: Reach, trample

card.name: Underbrush Predator
card.text: When Underbrush Predator enters the battlefield, another target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Evanesce {1}{G} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Elemental Embrace
card.text: Untap target land you control. That land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Answered Prayers
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Memorial {1}{G} (Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)

card.name: Squeal of the Cub
card.text: Put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Jungle's Heartbeat
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Menacing Charge
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. That creature must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Reclaiming Vines
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Stone Man
card.text: Penance — {2}, Sacrifice Stone Man: Draw a card.

card.name: Cobbled Wings
card.text: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Tactical Trebuchet
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Tactical Trebuchet deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Dream Retriever
card.text: When Dream Retriever enters the battlefield, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand. Evanesce {2} (You may cast this card as though it had flash for its evanesce cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Tribal Village
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to you mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tribal Village: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
